text:
I need to find
my missing piece.

♪ And be more than
a mystery ♪

So this part of the wolf den,
on a scale of one to ten

with one being
the least scary...
It's about a 27.

- Let's go!
- After you.

Aww. Always so polite,
even in a monster emergency.
Emphasis on the emergency!

Okay, we've got the glow.
Now we just need--
All: The vampire stone.
Wow.

So now, if we destroy
the pattern...
( grunting )
Nope. Don't like that.

It's about to get
crowded in here.
I don't understand!

There must be something
that de-charges them.

Oh, no, you don--
( howling )

That's it. Your howl.
Keep going!
( howling )
It's working.
( howling )
If one howl did all that,
what happens if...
( melodic howling )

Well, I'm not going to be
left out of this.
( melodic howling )
( music playing )

♪ Can you feel
the call to the wild? ♪

♪ Call to the wild,
call to the wild ♪

♪ We are the call,
we are the call ♪

♪ We are the call
to the wild ♪

♪ We are the call,
we are the call ♪

♪ We are the call
to the wild ♪

Ah, I love it when songs
are the solution.

Let's go sing
that shrimp back to sleep.
( melodic howling )
